DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Responses Autonomic Cardiac Function Diabetes Type-2 Women Post Resistance Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize cross-by block accordance CONSORT ( Schulz et al. , 2010 ) . In total , 12 woman DM-2 , 48 60 year old participate study , informed risk , benefit objective study sign consent form Clarified ( IC ) previously approve Ethics Committee Ethics Research Studies ( CEDEP ) Federal University São Francisco Valley ( UNIVASF ) , Petrolina - PE , Brazil ( No . 0005/180814 CEDEP ) . Of participant , 11 take oral hypoglycemic medication ( metformin [ n = 7 ] , Sulphonylurea [ n = 1 ] Metformin combination sulfonylurea [ n = 3 ] ) perform dietary control . Before first visit UNIVASF Exercise Physiology Laboratory , participant underwent rest ECG examination , could submit test one maximum repetition ( 1RM ) meeting report normality certify cardiologist . On first visit lab , participant respond history health history , physical activity level risk stratification . Subsequently perform anthropometric measurement waist circumference , abdomen hip , well height body mass subsequent calculation body mass index . Two week start intervention , participant underwent familiarization exercise protocol three alternate day . After 48 hour perform 1RM test follow exercise : bench press machine ( pectoral anterior deltoid muscle ) , extensor chair ( quadriceps muscle ) , Flying ( pectoral muscle ) , flexor chair ( muscle biceps femoris , semitendinosus semimembranosus ) , Pull High ahead ( posterior muscle torso biceps ) , leg press ( quadriceps gluteus ) , sit Remada ( posterior muscle torso biceps ) equipment Evidence® mark ( Cachoerinha / RS - Brazil ) Physicus® ( Auriflama / SP - Brazil ) . After 1RM test , participant receive guidance relation food intake practice daily physical activity , , 48 hour first day intervention , ingest drink contain alcohol caffeine . In day session , participant fast , go lab , receive standard breakfast contain 285 kcal , 45g ( 180 kcal ) carbohydrate , 6 g ( 24 kcal ) protein 9 g ( 81 kcal ) fat . Also ask maintain diet two-week intervention record consumption food diary , later analyze calculate trained nutritionist , use Microsoft Excel® software Brazilian Table Food Composition . It also recommend main meal take time day ( Breakfast 7:00 7:20h ; lunch 12:00h 14:00h Dinner 18:00h 20:00h ) . The energy intake consumption daily macronutrients differ session show Table 2 . During day intervention participant instruct refrain exercise / strenuous physical labor . The glucose sensor ( Sof-sensor , Medtronic Minimed , Inc. , Northridge , CA , USA ) instal day first session insert follow manufacturer 's instruction SMGG Guardian real-time ( Medtronic Minimed , Inc. , Northridge CA , USA ) , consist transmitter sensor insert needle abdominal subcutaneous tissue use device ( Sen-Seter , Medtronic Minimed , Inc. , Northridge , CA , USA ) monitor read wireless radio frequency sensor . This system validate DM control study complication . After installation , appropriate calibration equipment follow manufacturer 's recommendation . During monitoring period , capillary glucose sample collect use glucose monitor ( Accu-Check Performa , Roche Diagnostics , Mannheim , Germany ) calibrate SMCG , hold four time every 24 hour monitor researcher . Participants blind regard measurement SMCG capillary glucose calibration . The glucose concentration analyze day 1 ( 24 hour analysis observe effect control section ) , Day 2 ( 24h analysis observe effect Resistance Exercise - RE different intensity ) day 3 ( 11h analysis duration effect RE different intensity ) . To evaluate autonomic modulation adopt frequency meter Polar® RS800CX model ( Electo Oy , Kempele , Finland ) prove validity reproducibility ( Essner et al , 2013 ; Jonckheer-SHEEHY et al , 2012. ) . The investigated autonomic indicator : 1 ) straight-time domain absolute average record RR interval ( RRi ) ; 2 ) frequency domain method spectral analysis Fast Fourier Transformer ( low frequency - LF normalize unit marker sympathetic activity , high frequency - HF also normalize unit marker vagal activity , LF : . HF marker sympathovagal balance ) . All index describe European Society Cardiology ( TASK FORCE HEART Variability , 1996 ) Analyses performed Kubios HRV Analysis Software version 2.0 ( Biosignal Laboratory , University Kuopio , Finland ) . All participant take part randomize experimental study , consist two intervention period , period consist three day day 1 control session ( CONT ) hold , day 2 RE session ( 40 % 1RM 80 % 1RM ) , day 3 check duration effect exercise . Each intervention aim assess impact workout glycemic control standardize food free living condition . Initially participant arrive laboratory fast 7 : 00 time provide standardized breakfast contain 285kcal , breakfast period 7 : 00 - 7 : 20h . After period , volunteer instruct subsequent power session even time , frequency meter Polar RS800CX instal read RRi post-session , total 24 hour Heart Rate Variability ( HRV ) measurement . Each participant perform four session : CONT , ER 40 % 1RM ER 80 % 1RM , RE session different intensity randomize block , food standardization abstention type exercise , free living condition use SMCG polar frequency meter . In session glycemic autonomic response analyze 24-hour period start session . All session last 60 minute , consist 20 minute pre-intervention period ( rest ) control session 40min ( day1 ) session RE ( day 2 ) , performed time day 8:00 9:00 . During session participant already glucose monitor VFC . At end session , participant release daily routine always use SMCG frequency meter . The experimental session distribute two week , hold 1st week control session day 2 RE session ( 40 % 1RM 80 % 1RM ) . On day 3 intervention observe period 11h monitoring , possible duration ER effect precede day . Pre-intervention : Before intervention , participant remain seated laboratory period 20 minute quiet room without interference noise temperature 23-24ºC ( SOUZA et al , 2013. ) . During period , every 5 minute , concentration glucose SMCG RRi frequency meter obtain . Intervention : The intensity RE establish base classification American College Sport Medicine American Diabetes Association individual DM-2 , categorize low intensity 40 % 1RM high intensity exercise 80 % 1RM ( Colberg et al. , 2010 ) . RE session 40 % 80 % 1RM addition control section ( RE ) last 40 minute . For RE session hold three circuit 7 exercise , sequence 1RM test ( machine bench press , leg extension Chair , Flying , flexor chair , high Pull ahead , leg press , seat row ) . For RE session 40 % 1RM perform 16 repetition exercise interval 60 second 120 second circuit . For RE session 80 % 1RM perform 08 repetition exercise interval 90 second 120 second circuit . The duration repeat exercise 40 % 80 % 1RM 3 second , 1 second concentric phase 2 second eccentric phase movement . In CONT session participant remain seated comfortable chair , room ER session . Post-intervention : At end session participant release daily routine , orient record daily food intake ( day 1 ) equalize consumption follow day ( day 2 3 ) two week intervention . Also , avoid performing exercise nature make use medication way period intervention . Data express mean ± SD ( standard deviation ) . Data normality confirm Shapiro-Wilk test . The glucose value use determine average concentration glucose prevalence hyperglycemia ( blood glucose concentration exceed 160 mg.dL-1 ) 24 postprandial different time : breakfast ( 08 : 00 - 12 : 00 ) , lunch ( 13:00h - 18:00h ) , dinner ( 19:00h - 23:00h ) sleep ( 23:00h - 06:00h ) . Analysis variance one way ( ANOVA ) repeat measure perform determine difference experimental condition ( CONT x 40 % x 80 % 1RM ) . Post-hoc Tukey 's pair identification difference use ' F ' mean obtain . Pearson 's linear correlation test also adopt investigate association glucose HRV . Significance set p confidence level < 0.05 . All statistical calculation perform use STATISTICA software Windows v. 6.0 ( StatSoft , Inc . )
DOC.criteria: Being female , diagnose type 2 diabetes ( DM2 ) clinically stable , age 40 60 year . Make use exogenous insulin Have morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 kg / m2 ) Provide uncompensated glucose abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) rest suggestion cardiac ischemia unevenness ST segment > 2mm reversal T wave Presenting heart disease Proliferative diabetic retinopathy Severe autonomic neuropathy Any limb amputation Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic > 160 mmHg / diastolic BP > 100 mmHg ) Diabetic nephropathy ( albuminuria ≥ 14mg / L > 30mg / 24h ) chronic renal failure ( SBD , 2014 ; ADA , 2014 ) Osteomyoarticular problem limit exercise smoker .
